allow: Bash(npx -y tsx -e "import { config } from ''dotenv''; import { resolve } from ''path''; config({ path: resolve(process.cwd(), ''.env.local'') }); import { createClient } from ''@supabase/supabase-js''; const supabase = createClient(process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY); const { data } = await supabase.from(''genres'').select(''id, name, slug'').ilike(''name'', ''%ゲイ%''); console.log(''ゲイ関連ジャンル:'', JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)); for (const g of data || []) { const { count } = await supabase.from(''videos'').select(''*'', { count: ''exact'', head: true }).contains(''genre_ids'', [g.id]); console.log(g.name + '':'', count + ''件''); }")
